/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different colors are scattered across the road, hinting at the busy traffic typical of urban areas. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being enveloped by the cityscape.
